Sample rate: 8–192kHzMPEG 2 AAC was limited to a 96kHz sampling rate, however, with MPEG 4 AAC, a later version part of the MPEG 4 specification, the maximum sampling rate has been increased to 192kHz.

Stereo: yes: only in MPEG-4 Part 12 container

VBR: yes: but decoders are not required to support it
yes: but decoders are not required to support it
Multichannel: yes: up to 5 full range audio channels and an LFE-channel with MPEG Multichannel

Bit rate: 196kbit/s and up in lossy mode (for CD audio)
